name: Dungeon Bard (Mig Creates Games)
description:
This was 12 day game jam to make a bard game that uses voice to hurt enemies. I went with a classis timed turned based game for possible game ideas to use in the future. It turned out well and I do like to implement Dungeon Bard into a game in the near future. I used my voice to make the shouts or songs.

Controls

A: Song

S: Ice Song

D: Haste

Q: Potion
